DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Finding problem affect employment survivor gynecologic cancer may help plan cancer treatment improve quality life future cancer survivor . PURPOSE : This research study look way improve employment patient survive cervical cancer , uterine cancer , ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Employment Patients Who Have Survived Cervical Cancer , Uterine Cancer , Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Conduct formative work , include 4 5 focus group , lead development structure interview instrument assess factor related employment outcome among woman gynecologic cancer . - Pilot recruitment strategy administer interview among sample 60 70 gynecologic cancer survivor ; , woman 's permission , family member , key health care provider , supervisor interview . OUTLINE : This multicenter , pilot study . Patients complete survey , meet focus group , undergo short interview . Patient-designated participant also interview ; individual may include health care provider , significant , and/or work supervisor . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 70 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Diagnosis 1 follow invasive cancer : Cervical cancer Uterine cancer Ovarian cancer Diagnosed ≥ 6 month ago Any stage disease Employed time diagnosis , define work pay ≥ 20 hours/week PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : Not specify PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Not specify
